caption: Relating to requiring a person to submit proof of citizenship to register to vote; creating criminal offenses.
summary: This bill requires proof of citizenship for voter registration in Texas. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects all non-citizens including Chinese nationals by requiring them to provide documentation like passports, birth certificates, or naturalization papers to register to vote. Those who cannot verify citizenship can only vote in federal elections (US Senate/House races). The bill creates criminal penalties for non-citizens who attempt to register.
translation: 该法案要求在德克萨斯州登记投票时必须提供公民身份证明。虽然并非专门针对中国移民，但该法案会影响包括中国公民在内的所有非公民，要求他们提供护照、出生证明或入籍文件等证明才能登记投票。无法验证公民身份的人只能在联邦选举（美国参议院/众议院竞选）中投票。该法案对试图登记的非公民设定刑事处罚。
committees:
